description: This file defines API endpoints for managing financial transactions in a backend service. It includes route handlers for listing, retrieving, creating, updating, and deleting transactions, with dependencies for authentication and database session management. It also defines a schema for updating transactions.

classes.name: TransactionUpdate
classes.description: Schema for updating a transaction, with optional fields.

methods.name: list[TransactionSchema] list_transactions( db: Annotated[Session, Depends(get_db)], current_user: Annotated[User, Depends(get_current_user)], start: Optional[date] = Query(None, description="Start date inclusive (YYYY-MM-DD)"), end: Optional[date] = Query(None, description="End date inclusive (YYYY-MM-DD)"), category: Optional[str] = Query(None, description="Filter by category (exact match)"), )
methods.description: Retrieve a list of transactions for the current user with optional filtering.

methods.name: TransactionSchema get_transaction( tx_id: int, db: Annotated[Session, Depends(get_db)], current_user: Annotated[User, Depends(get_current_user)], )
methods.description: Retrieve a specific transaction by ID for the current user.

methods.name: TransactionSchema create_transaction( payload: TransactionCreateSchema, db: Annotated[Session, Depends(get_db)], current_user: Annotated[User, Depends(get_current_user)], )
methods.description: Create a new transaction for the current user.

methods.name: TransactionSchema update_transaction( tx_id: int, payload: TransactionUpdate, db: Annotated[Session, Depends(get_db)], current_user: Annotated[User, Depends(get_current_user)], )
methods.description: Update an existing transaction by ID for the current user.

methods.name: Response delete_transaction( tx_id: int, db: Annotated[Session, Depends(get_db)], current_user: Annotated[User, Depends(get_current_user)], )
methods.description: Delete a transaction by ID for the current user.

ctags.name: amount
ctags.pattern: /^    amount: Optional[float] = Field(None, description="Amount, positive for income")$/

ctags.name: create_transaction
ctags.signature: ( payload: TransactionCreateSchema, db: Annotated[Session, Depends(get_db)], current_user: Annotated[User, Depends(get_current_user)], )

ctags.name: delete_transaction
ctags.signature: ( tx_id: int, db: Annotated[Session, Depends(get_db)], current_user: Annotated[User, Depends(get_current_user)], )

ctags.name: get_transaction
ctags.signature: ( tx_id: int, db: Annotated[Session, Depends(get_db)], current_user: Annotated[User, Depends(get_current_user)], )

ctags.name: list_transactions
ctags.signature: ( db: Annotated[Session, Depends(get_db)], current_user: Annotated[User, Depends(get_current_user)], start: Optional[date] = Query(None, description="Start date inclusive (YYYY-MM-DD)"), end: Optional[date] = Query(None, description="End date inclusive (YYYY-MM-DD)"), category: Optional[str] = Query(None, description="Filter by category (exact match)"), )

ctags.name: txn_date
ctags.pattern: /^    txn_date: Optional[date] = Field(None, alias="date", description="Transaction date")$/

ctags.name: type
ctags.pattern: /^    type: Optional[str] = Field(None, description="Transaction type: expense or income")$/

ctags.name: update_transaction
ctags.signature: ( tx_id: int, payload: TransactionUpdate, db: Annotated[Session, Depends(get_db)], current_user: Annotated[User, Depends(get_current_user)], )
